topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Yarra River Test
ideas.premise: An Australian cricketer, mid-swing, accidentally hits the ball so hard it lands in the Yarra, turning the notoriously brown river momentarily green.
ideas.why_funny: Playing on the Yarra's reputation and the absurd visual of instant river discolouration.

ideas.title: The G's Psychic Pigeon
ideas.premise: A pigeon at the MCG is consistently predicting wickets before they happen, infuriating the bookies and baffling Shane Warne's ghost.
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne pigeons are everywhere. The idea of one being psychic and messing with the gambling industry is funny.

ideas.title: The Tim Tam Slam Dunk
ideas.premise: After a six, a fan tries to do a Tim Tam Slam with their beer, only to find the melted chocolate ruins their brand-new team jersey.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Aussie experience with Tim Tams and beer gone wrong. The ruined jersey adds to the humour.

ideas.title: Live Updates From Luna Park
ideas.premise: A news crew doing live updates from St Kilda's Luna Park keeps getting interrupted by screams from the rollercoaster, making serious commentary impossible.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of high-stakes cricket with the chaotic atmosphere of Luna Park and failing to present sport news seriously.

ideas.title: Vegemite Wicket
ideas.premise: The Australian team rubs Vegemite on the ball for extra grip, resulting in an unusually sticky wicket and bewildered Indian batsmen.
ideas.why_funny: Classic Aussie icon used in a ridiculous way, causing unexpected consequences and baffling opponents.
